Package io.xmljim.algorithms.functions.statistics

Interface LinearRegressionModel

All Superinterfaces:
io.xmljim.algorithms.model.Model, io.xmljim.algorithms.model.NamedEntity, io.xmljim.algorithms.model.Parameterized, io.xmljim.algorithms.model.VariableEntity
public interface LinearRegressionModel
extends io.xmljim.algorithms.model.Model
A statistical model that solves for the linear relationship between two variables with the equation: 

y = αx + β

Where:

y is the predicted value

x is the observed independent variable value

α is the slope (increase/decrease) of the relationship between x and y

β is the y-intercept constant
